    		Campus Safety
    	The safety of our students, faculty, staff, and visitors is Chico State’s top priority. In addition to modernizing our policies and procedures, creating a safer and more secure campus requires the participation of our entire community and shared responsibility in how we prevent, promptly address, and recover from crimes, threats, natural disasters and other hazards.Please use the information on this website and learn how to report criminal actions and access the many services we have to support your health, well-being, and rights. Working together, we can continue to make Chico State a safer and better prepared community.Safety and Preparedness:What to Do in an EmergencyReport a CrimeActive Shooter TrainingTitle IXUniversity PoliceChico State Alerts—Emergency Notification SystemSupport ResourcesWellCat Safe Place—Confidential Support for Victims of ViolenceWellCat Counseling CenterWellCat Health CenterEmployee Assistance ProgramBasic NeedsCARE TeamStudent Conduct, Rights, and ResponsibilitiesEquity, Diversity, and InclusionDivision of Business & FinanceVice President for Business & FinanceZip Code: 95929-0025www.csuchico.edu/vpbfDepartmentsAudit ServicesDistribution ServicesEnvironmental Health and SafetyFacilities Management and ServicesFinancial ServicesHuman Resources Service CenterProcurement & Contract ServicesRisk ManagementStaff CouncilUniversity Budget OfficeUniversity Police
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
